member.name: M:A2S.Players.Query(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Queries the server and requests information on all connected players in accordance with A2S_Player.

member.name: M:A2S.Server.Query(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Queries the server and returns server information in accordance with A2S_Info.
